infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location when open for tracking your movements.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to location when in the background for tracking significant movements.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs access to location when in the background for tracking significant movements.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app uses motion data to monitor user activity for wellness insights.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app reads health data to provide personalized feedback based on your activity.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app writes activity and wellness-related data to your Health app.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location for tracking your movements for research purposes.
